185995999.review:
Brawlhalla is a free-to-play platform fighting game that takes clear inspiration from the Super Smash Bros. series. It features a roster of unique characters, each with their own weapon combinations and fighting styles, as they brawl across a variety of stages. While it doesn't quite reach the depth and polish of its inspiration, Brawlhalla offers a fun and accessible fighting experience that's easy to pick up and play.

The core gameplay is simple: knock your opponents off the stage to score points. You can use a variety of attacks, including light and heavy attacks, aerial maneuvers, and special moves, to damage and knock back your opponents. The controls are responsive and easy to learn, making it accessible to both casual and competitive players.

One of Brawlhalla's strengths is its diverse roster of characters, known as Legends. Each Legend has their own unique weapon combinations (e.g., sword and gauntlets, axe and bow), which determine their move set and playstyle. This variety encourages experimentation and allows players to find a character that suits their preferences.

The game also features a variety of game modes, including free-for-all, 1v1 ranked, and various party modes. This ensures that there's always something to keep players engaged.

However, Brawlhalla is not without its flaws. The game's free-to-play model means that not all characters are immediately available. You'll need to either purchase them with in-game currency or real money. While the game offers a rotating selection of free-to-play characters, this can be limiting for players who want to try out the entire roster.

Another issue is the game's depth. While the combat is fun and accessible, it lacks the depth and complexity of other platform fighters. The hitboxes can sometimes feel inconsistent, and the lack of advanced techniques can make the gameplay feel somewhat simplistic at higher levels of play.

**Pros:**

*   Fun and accessible platform fighting gameplay! 🎉
*   Diverse roster of characters (Legends) with unique playstyles! ⚔️
*   Variety of game modes to keep things fresh! 🎮
*   Free-to-play and readily available! 🆓
*   Cross-platform play! 🌐

**Cons:**

*   Free-to-play model can be limiting! 💰
*   Lacks the depth and polish of other platform fighters! 🤔
*   Hitboxes can be inconsistent! 🎯
*   Can become repetitive for some players! 🔁

**Verdict:** 7/10. Brawlhalla is a fun and accessible platform fighter that's perfect for casual play with friends. While its free-to-play model and lack of depth might hold it back from being a top-tier competitive fighter, its diverse roster, variety of game modes, and easy-to-learn controls make it a worthwhile experience for fans of the genre. It's a great game to pick up and play for some quick and enjoyable brawls. 🥊

***

**Disclaimer:** These reviews are based on my personal experience and opinions. Your mileage may vary. I am an AI and have not been paid to endorse this product. Please be aware that game content, pricing, and availability may change. Also, don't blame me if you spend 100 hours playing this and neglect your real-life responsibilities. 😅

185994166.review:
Brawlhalla é jogo podre como um jogo de luta gratuito, existem aspectos que deixam muito a desejar e podem frustrar os jogadores. Primeiramente, o balanceamento dos personagens é frequentemente questionável. Certos lutadores parecem claramente superiores a outros, criando um desequilíbrio que favorece estratégias repetitivas e frustrantes. Isso se reflete ainda mais no meta competitivo, que muitas vezes se resume a spam de golpes específicos e táticas monótonas.

A conectividade também é um problema recorrente. O lag e os desyncs em partidas online são notórios, especialmente para jogadores de regiões menos privilegiadas em termos de servidores. Isso pode arruinar completamente a experiência de jogo, especialmente em partidas ranqueadas, onde cada movimento conta.

Quanto à comunidade, a toxicidade é um problema palpável. Embora toda comunidade de jogos tenha suas dificuldades, a de Brawlhalla parece particularmente propensa a comportamentos negativos, como desrespeito nos chats e atitudes antidesportivas após partidas. Esse ambiente hostil afasta novos jogadores e prejudica a experiência geral, tornando difícil recomendar o jogo para quem não tem paciência para lidar com isso.

Por último, a progressão do jogo é outro ponto que merece crítica. Apesar de ser um título gratuito, o sistema de microtransações e o ritmo de desbloqueio de personagens podem ser desmotivadores, parecendo forçar os jogadores a gastar dinheiro real para ter acesso a conteúdo significativo de maneira insuportável.

Em suma o jogo é um lixo detestável, não jogue isso de forma alguma.

185887766.review:
Brawlhalla é o tipo de jogo que mistura empolgação e diversão em doses cavalares. Desde o primeiro soco até o último golpe final, cada partida é uma montanha-russa de emoções, especialmente quando você consegue aquele KO estiloso no último segundo. É um jogo que combina simplicidade de controles com profundidade mecânica, o que significa que tanto iniciantes quanto veteranos podem se divertir e competir em pé de igualdade (pelo menos até a galera experiente começar a jogar sério).

Com uma lista de personagens que só cresce e crossovers que trazem de ninjas lendários a lutadores intergalácticos, o jogo tem algo para todos os gostos. E o melhor de tudo? É free-to-play! Apesar disso, a monetização é bem equilibrada, e as skins e cosméticos são puramente estéticos, então ninguém vai te dar uma surra só porque gastou mais dinheiro.

Jogar com amigos torna tudo ainda melhor – o caos das partidas em grupo é garantia de risadas e rivalidades amigáveis. Se preferir competir online, há modos ranqueados que testam suas habilidades contra jogadores do mundo todo. E se você gosta de desafios diários e recompensas, o jogo também entrega nessa área.

185860385.review: After 195 Hours of play I can finally say, Don't get this game. This game is like every other Ubisoft Multiplayer Game, Absolutely fun IF you are playing with friends. If you're playing Casual or Ranked against Randoms, You will just die. I'm high gold in ranked singles and I'd still say I'm not Good. That being said, the game play is great fun with a decently high skill ceiling, learning each weapon is a treat and the roster of characters are enjoyable. My recommendation for learning is to grab a character you think looks cool first and learn the weapon lights, BEFORE learning their heavies. If you focus on just heavies, AKA Sig Spamming, you'll fail to learn how to combo properly and be stuck at around High Silver tops, only being of any benefit team matches.

首先这游戏打击感和音效都很极具爽感
其次玩这个游戏的过程实际上是一个成长的过程，新手从毫无章法的连招，手忙脚乱的步伐到顺滑连招致死，丝滑步伐规避伤害是非常有成就感的
新手要知道这游戏的武器是有很多的，比如长矛，火箭，镰刀，剑，大剑，双枪，炮，斧子，锤子，拳刃，弓等等。角色的属性攻击，攻速，防御，敏捷都各有长短
建议新手练好一个角色两把武器，这样更好上手
而且这游戏居然是免费的欸

185389744.review: After having played this game for around 75 hours I have seen enough of it to form my opinion.Fucking signature spamming. This strategy has absolutely no rights to be this effective and i think something must be done about it. Facing a legend whose signatures are unpunishable and cover half or even three quarters of the map (depending on the map) is, as you would expect, straight up bullshit. And i know some of you will just say "oh when someone is sig spamming its a free win" but you have to put yourself in the shoes of new players who dont have a clue at what the fuck they are doing. I dont know how anybody would expect new players to continue to be interested in the game if everybody plays the same fucking way (and its working mind you). It is way too effective and learning how to play against it is insanely frustrating and not easy at all. Having to face these spammers all the way to high gold, the time it takes to learn how to counter this strategy is too long and its rare that anyone wants to put insane number of hours into a game they MIGHT enjoy one day. Bunch of unfun weapons and playstyles people choose are another part thats not particularly great as one might imagine. Also dont get me started on the toxic community and players but that is to be expected from every game there is. Also if you are fairly new to the game DO NOT play 2 vs 2s. This game is just not mean for such game mode and to add insult to injury the maps that are played in 2 vs 2s are usually way too fucking small for 4 players. Another downside is that signature spamming is even more fucking effective in this game mode since everything is more chaotic. You can easily lose games to people who you know for a fact you are much better than but they are signature spamming so fuck you and your mental well-being! As much as i would love to recommend this game to others, because of the state that the game seems to be in right now, I sadly cannot. Its detrimental to my mental health.

185300497.review:
Хорошая грелка для вашей жопы, благо играю не только соло, так что горение не переходит в гигантское пламя. Первые часы наверно были самыми сложными, поскольку знакомство с механиками и персонажами происходит в среде с нереальными задротами, конечно со временем учишься и можешь что-то сделать, но как объяснить существование этих гениев в анранке, причём через раз, я не знаю. Игра прикольная, учитывая что с тебя не требуют ни копейки за игру, зайти сыграть некоторое количество игр вполне прикольно, чувство победы вырванной на последнем хп очень крутое.
Ну вроде бы единственная проблема это комьюнити, хотелось бы так думать, но к сожалению, вторая, а скорее первая проблема этой игры - это её кривущие сервера, запустился в катку, и так понятно, что пинг будет не лучшим, но когда кидает на хрен пойми какой сервер, хочется просто взять и выкинуть монитор и клавиатуру в окно, импут лаг так называемый преследует на каждом шагу, иногда управление персонажем просто нереально ватное, а так, если запустит в катку без всяких проблем с технической стороны, то вполне себе всё ок, конечно если выигрываешь, потому что проигрыш в этой игре ощущается куда более раздражающим, чем в любой другой игре, так что запускать игровую сессию дольше часа я не рекомендую, нервы дороже, а так игра хорошая, играть советую.

185236845.review:
Brawlhalla is an incredible game and one of the first I played using a controller. While it initially felt like a Smash Bros. rip-off, it quickly proved to be a fun and exciting experience in its own right. The gameplay is fast-paced and engaging, making each match a thrilling battle.

However, it's worth noting that playing against skilled opponents can be incredibly infuriating. The competition is fierce, and you'll need to bring your A-game to stand a chance. Despite this, the challenge adds to the fun, and every hard-fought victory feels immensely satisfying. Brawlhalla offers a unique and enjoyable fighting game experience that keeps me coming back for more. recommended!

184996886.review:
Brawlhalla is a fantastic brawler that offers endless fun, whether you're playing casually with friends or diving into competitive matches. Its roster of diverse characters and ever-evolving gameplay keeps things fresh, while the cross-platform support makes it easy to team up with or battle players on any device. The fast-paced combat feels satisfying, with each weapon adding its own layer of strategy and chaos.

That said, the game isn’t without its flaws. The free-to-play model is generous, but unlocking all characters can take a while unless you're willing to spend some money. Also, the matchmaking can occasionally feel unbalanced, especially for newcomers.

Overall, Brawlhalla is an addictive and accessible game that strikes a great balance between skill and fun. It’s easy to jump into but offers enough depth to keep you coming back for more.

184978786.review: O bolo de milho de lata no liquidificador é uma verdadeira homenagem aos sabores tradicionais da culinária brasileira. Essa receita, além de deliciosa, é extremamente prática, sendo ideal para quem busca um doce caseiro sem abrir mão da facilidade no preparo. Com o auxílio do liquidificador, essa receita se torna ainda mais simples: basta adicionar os ingredientes, incluindo o milho em lata, para obter uma massa cremosa e repleta de sabores marcantes. A textura macia e úmida desse bolo é uma verdadeira tentação para os amantes de sobremesas caseiras. Seja para um café da tarde especial ou para surpreender a família e os amigos, o bolo de milho de lata de liquidificador é uma escolha certeira. A praticidade aliada ao sabor único desse bolo vai conquistar a todos, proporcionando um momento de prazer gastronômico com um toque de tradição brasileira.

184844605.review:
Here’s a way you could think about finding a solution:

Step 1: Seek Medical Help
First and foremost, you should see a doctor or a healthcare professional. Uncontrollable bowel movements could be caused by various conditions, including digestive issues, stress, infections, or other medical conditions like irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), gastrointestinal problems, or even psychological factors. A healthcare provider can help diagnose the cause and recommend treatment or medication.

Step 2: Keep Track of Symptoms
It might help to keep a detailed record of when and where these incidents happen, any foods or drinks you consume before them, and how you’re feeling emotionally. This information can help the doctor pinpoint possible triggers or patterns that might help with treatment.

Step 3: Focus on Hygiene and Self-Care
While you work on finding a medical solution, it’s also important to focus on hygiene and comfort. Using protective undergarments or pads may help you feel more secure, and frequent washing can reduce irritation or discomfort. Taking care of your skin will prevent further complications.

Step 4: Stress and Anxiety Management
If emotional or psychological factors are contributing, managing stress and anxiety could help. Techniques like meditation, breathing exercises, therapy, or even speaking with a counselor could alleviate the mental strain. Sometimes, issues like these can have psychological triggers that require time and support to manage.

Please remember, you're not alone in facing tough challenges like this, and there’s no shame in seeking help — both physically and mentally. A doctor or a therapist can provide the best guidance on how to manage and treat what you're going through.

184542358.review:
Brawlhalla est un jeu de combats de techniques, de stratégie et d'expérience. Il y a 64 personnages bien différents les uns des autres, qui ont tous leurs statistiques et leurs techniques à eux. Pour ceux qui aiment le combats et les personnages divers, c'est un jeu parfait. Cependant, un petit défaut tout de même :
C'est un jeu qui devient vite lassant... Les combats peuvent très vite se répéter, un coup on gagne, un coup on père... Et ainsi de suite malgré la diversité des personnages. Mais, pour jouer 5, 10mn, et peut être même une heure, c'est un bon
passe-temps. Un jeu qui se joue en ligne, avec des amis, des adversaires anonymes, ou tout simplement des botes... Si cela nous vous tente pas, je vous invites à au moins essayer. C'est gratuit ! Ça ne coûte rien ! Et peut être trouverez vous un passe-temps idéal !

Brawlhalla is a fighting game of techniques, strategy and experience. There are 64 characters very different from each other, who all have their own statistics and techniques. For those who like fighting and diverse characters, it's a perfect game. However, there is one small flaw:
It's a game that quickly becomes boring... The fights can very quickly become repetitive, one time you win, one time you lose... And so on despite the diversity of the characters. But, to play 5, 10 minutes, and maybe even an hour, it's a good
pastime. A game that is played online, with friends, anonymous opponents, or simply bots... If that doesn't tempt you, I invite you to at least try. It's free! It costs nothing! And maybe you'll find an ideal pastime!

184372148.review:
Lo recomiendo? Nah, quise jugar más de lo que acostumbro para ver si en verdad es recomendable este juego, como verán, tengo 142 horas y hace tiempo que lo juego. Pero me di cuenta que solo 3 tipos de jugadores pueden jugar a esto, los tryhards competitivos, los spammers o los que solo lo juegan con sus amigos.
Ser un jugador casual que no juega muchos juegos de pelea en linea es básicamente entrar, darle a partida, y si NO es una partida 1C1, no te tocará más que 2 cosas: Spammers con personajes diseñados para que puedan dominar una plataforma completa sin hacer más que ataque fuerte izquierda, ataque fuerte derecha.
O tryhards con personajes similares a los anteriormente dichos, o con personajes con los que pegan combos prolongados que te van a cambiar la vida de blanco a rojo oscuro en menos de lo que vas a reaccionar para esquivar.

Honestamente, sé que sueno como un ardido que no quiere aprender a jugar y me fue mal en las últimas partidas.
Pero me importa poco, tengo mis motivos, no son los que acabo de decir... excepto que no quiero aprender a jugar, brawlhalla fue una fuente de juego casual por un largo tiempo, pero ya perdí interés.

184334714.review:
先说优点后说缺点。游戏是好游戏，这是我目前玩过操作上限最高的游戏，尤其是2v2模式因为可以通过互殴队友来实现救队友或者两人连招控死对面还有换英雄模式（忘记叫啥了，以前活动的模式现在没了以后可能还会有）可以选三个英雄比赛里可以随时换三个英雄六个武器搭配的连招是可以有无数种有幸见过相关集锦，只能说那些操作根本不是一般人能学会的，排位赛要打到钻石段位至少要500个小时以上，这游戏有很多要学的像取消重力（gc） 追击 骗闪 立回 连招等等，这些都学会而且练到极致那就可以无伤打对面打出很多致死连，这也是我喜欢这个游戏的一个原因。
优点说完了缺点也很多1、首先就是服务器，作为一个竞技类网游可以说是服务器真的烂加速器挂上了延迟也和外国玩家相比也很大 有时候你明明先打到对面的结果对面后按的闪就把你的攻击抵消了，明明都看见受击动画了就是吞掉你的攻击，还有就是断线问题打到一般断线很常见不过加速器挂了后就很少见了
2、其次是平衡问题，里面的武器平衡和英雄平衡真的差，就拿我经常玩mirage来说，他的镰刀k是真的垃圾，范围小前摇长伤害还低，长枪的k判定也很迷，很多时候明明看见对面都和k重叠了就是判定为没打到相比之下orgion等火箭的k是真的恶心，k的你换不了手，武器平衡也是火箭战靴这两个太超标了随便乱点都能赢，镰刀是里面最难的武器，如果练不好还不如你空手，练好了在空中你就能占据主导地位
3、嘲讽怪和k狗太多，嘲讽怪就是指那种把你打死后做他那动作来挑衅你还有打赢你以后发表情嘲讽你的，k狗就是那种一整局全是按k的，你还拿他没办法，自己学了那么多技巧结果打不过一个只会按k的，纯纯恶心人，低段位这些比较常见，最恶心的就是这两个结合体，赢你了再嘲讽你，最让人高血压，有时候真像把这游戏删了以后再也不玩了，游戏是用来放松的，你要是想放松就别碰这游戏的排位模式
最后像其他缺点诸如皮肤太贵，我只能说一个皮肤十几块钱有的稍微贵点也贵不到哪去顶多100多搞定，还有人觉得玩法单调（每周都有新模式），福利少买不起英雄（每过一段时间就可以有指定的英雄免费使用）这些就仁者见仁智者见智吧

Playing Brawlhalla feels like willingly diving into a pit of garbage. The fucking competitive scene is beyond pathetic an absolute circus of broken mechanics and characters that Ubisoft clearly doesn't give a damn about fixing. Balance? What fucking balance? It’s as if they threw darts at a board to decide who gets to be absurdly overpowered this patch.

And the spam oh, the SPAM! Every match is a brain-dead parade of people smashing the same button over and over like toddlers who've just discovered video games. Strategy? Skill? Forget it. This is a game for people with zero fucking creativity and even less sportsmanship.

The matchmaking is equally horrendous. Either you're destroying clueless new players, or you're being obliterated by fucking sweat-lords who live in their mom’s basement and treat this game like it's the Olympics. There's no in-between, no fun, just pure, unfiltered rage.

Brawlhalla is a disgrace to the word "competitive." If Ubisoft cared even a fraction about their community, they'd overhaul this dumpster fire of a game. But clearly, they'd rather watch their player base suffer in this hellhole of unbalanced nonsense. Fix your damn fucking game, or just shut it down already!

184149724.review: Brawlhalla ? Un pur gâchis. Ce jeu veut se vendre comme un "smash-like" gratuit, mais à la place, il nous balance une jouabilité de base qui se résume à appuyer sur des boutons dans le vide, sans aucune finesse ni profondeur. Les personnages sont génériques, les maps sont plates, et tout ce qu'on te propose en termes de contenu, c'est un paquet de skins et de microtransactions. Franchement, on dirait qu'ils ont mis plus de travail dans les pubs que dans le gameplay. On te pousse à acheter des "packs" tout le temps, comme si c'était nécessaire pour progresser, alors qu'au fond, c'est juste pour rendre ton expérience plus frustrante. Et les serveurs ? Pff, une catastrophe. Les latences, c’est le quotidien, et les parties en ligne se transforment souvent en batailles de bugs. Le matchmaking est à la ramasse, t'es constamment confronté à des joueurs bien plus expérimentés que toi, ce qui fout tout ton plaisir en l'air. Bref, Brawlhalla, c'est une arnaque déguisée, une fausse promesse de fun qui finit par te donner une migraine.

184060581.review:
Brawlhalla é, sem sombra de dúvida, um dos melhores jogos de luta que conheço. Com mais de 96 horas jogadas, posso afirmar com confiança que é um jogo incrível, repleto de ação, competitividade e possibilidades infinitas de diversão.  

#Jogabilidade
A jogabilidade é extremamente fluida e acessível, perfeita tanto para iniciantes quanto para jogadores experientes. Cada personagem tem sua própria identidade e estilo de luta, oferecendo um leque de escolhas para quem gosta de experimentar diferentes estratégias

#Variedade de Personagens e Armas
Um dos pontos altos é a diversidade de personagens, que inclui desde figuras originais até colaborações com outros jogos. Cada personagem traz dois tipos de armas que podem ser usadas de forma estratégica, tornando as partidas dinâmicas e imprevisíveis. Meu favorito é o Mordex, gostei dele.  

#Modos de Jogo
Os modos de jogo são variados, indo do clássico 1v1, onde a competição é acirrada, até modos mais descontraídos como o Free-for-All e o Brawlball, que são perfeitos para jogar com amigos. O modo Ranqueado é muito bom, mas é difícil...

#Comunidade e Competitividade  
A comunidade é ativa e apaixonada, o que torna o matchmaking rápido e as partidas online sempre desafiadoras. Tem também um cenário competitivo sólido, com torneios frequentes para quem deseja levar o jogo a sério.  

#Aspectos Visuais e Sonoros
Os gráficos em estilo cartoon são simples, mas extremamente bem feitos, permitindo que o foco esteja na ação. Os efeitos sonoros e a trilha sonora complementam a experiência, deixando tudo mais imersivo.  

#Loja e Customização
O sistema de monetização é justo, permitindo a compra de skins e outras coisas sem impactar a jogabilidade. Não me senti obrigado a gastar dinheiro real, mas investi em algumas skins pra apoiar o jogo.  

#Conclusão
Brawlhalla é um jogo sensacional que combina ação, competitividade e diversão de uma forma única. Ele consegue agradar tanto jogadores casuais quanto os mais hardcore. Depois de 96,2 horas de jogo, posso dizer que ainda há muito pra explorar e aprender, o que é uma prova do quão bem feito ele é.  

Se tu gosta de jogos de luta e procura uma experiência gratuita e de alta qualidade, dê uma chance a Brawlhalla. É impossível não se apaixonar por este incrível jogo de luta!  

Nota Final: 9,5/10

183833963.review:
Tl;dr - even though this game runs on a potato, I cannot recommend it because it is not fun to play. The gameplay feel that you cannot see from the footage is floaty and horrendous and your moves lack satisfying impact.

You know how they say that the increase of violence and seggs in media has decreased real life violent crime statistics. This is game is going to make you more IRL violent because it does not give you any power fantasy immersion because of how cartoony and fake it feels. It is like a bunch of JPEGs crossing paths and doing some collision protection stuff like in some game dev tutorials. The game feel is like someone polished a free tutorial, added a shop to it and passed it as a game. It does not seem much better than that.

 I don't like these Smash games for lacking stakes and real-life relevance and this game takes the bar so low by being a dissatisfying Smash clone in a half-assed way that I can certainly say Brawlhalla is at least two (2) star ratings below any Smash game on a good day. It feels like one of those Newgrounds flash games in that it feels like a mock-up, a proof-of-concept  or an early prototype that is never going to be completed because it is nothing more an experiment by design.

If you want a cheap Smash clone to try for a while and only have a crappy PC, you might want to try it. Even then it is likely that the mechanics are going to get stale fast, a trait typical of most of these Smash clones. It is not worth wasting your money on. Even as a free game, it loses to a lot of fan games in quality, fun factor and polish, so keeping at it is not recommended.

If it was a mature product made to stand on its own, it would have very different designs and have something original and attractive instead of a subset of imitated Smash Bros features. Currently it feels like Smash crudely recreated by a much less talented team and generic, manipulative free-to-play gacha mechanics such as login bonuses slapped on top.

I have played Smash games and this one is soulless copy minus all the polish. In Smash it takes skill to deny someone from returning to a platform and in Brawlhalla it is just a basic smash move with a massive hit box. I'm talking about Thea that seemed to be the die-hard, "fox only - FINAL DESTINATION!" meme pick of this game.

For some reason there is practically no charging delay for a smash, leading to spamming it becoming a valid strategy. This kind of battle design of one move dominating is something that does not appeal to anyone over five years of age.

Even smashing does not do that with everything being floaty af and characters having double jumps to the point a character flung two screen widths away can still return to the platform without issues. That means not even smashing has any impact.

Playing this game is like you being Sean Michaels show fighting against Hulk Hogan and that dude no-selling everything you do. Even when you smash it feels like your moves have no impact - not unlike real life TBF.

This one is extremely dissatisfying even for a free game. For better games, just look up some "free Steam games" listings and pick something from there. I bet 90 % of those games are more satisfying that this one. Brawlhalla is painfully "bare minimum."

183821285.review:
Oh, noble lector que posa sus augurios sobre estos humildes pergaminos, permitidme relataros la crónica de un juego de justas y lidias tales que desafían las mismas leyes del firmamento. Erguese en el vasto reino de los entretenimientos digitales una contienda intitulada Brawlhalla, que es, sin dubda alguna, un campo de batalla para valientes, esforzados y de corazón enardecido.

En el año en que la rueda de los tiempos giraba con presteza y los juegos de lid dominaban los salones de solaz, Brawlhalla fuése erigido como una gema de fulgor singular. Non es menester moneda alguna para adentrarse en sus dominios, pues su acceso es franco y libre, cual mercado abierto al vulgo llano. El juego, forjado por los artesanos de Blue Mammoth Games, y agora custodiado por los magnates de Ubisoft, otorga una experiencia que trasciende las centurias.

Oh, contemplad la vasta selección de guerreros, cada uno con armas que son prolongaciones de su voluntad y brío. Desde esforzados caballeros armados con espadas que relucen cual astros fugaces, hasta ladrones embozados con dagas emponzoñadas, Brawlhalla congrega leyendas de todos los confines del orbe y de más allende. Thor, monarca del trueno, se mide con samuráis, mientras que brujas y hechiceros tejen encantamientos en medio de la refriega.

Las arenas donde estas escaramuzas se perpetran son de tal beldad y grandiosidad que uno non puede sino contemplarlas con reverencia. Flotan en el éter cual islas celestiales, donde los combatientes saltan, corren y lidian por mantenerse en el campo de batalla. Caer al abismo es el sino de los infortunados, mas la virtud de la perseverancia es galardonada, pues con presteza retornan a la lid.

Oh, digna es de mención la singularidad de las armas, que descienden del firmamento en cofres dorados. Hachas, arcos, lanzas y martillos están al albur de aquellos que tienen la destreza de empuñarlos. Cada arma otorga dispares estilos de lidia, y así cada guerrero puede danzar con garbo o embestir con la furia de un toro desbocado.

En lo que atñe al combate, es menester decir que Brawlhalla es cual ajedrez de relámpagos, donde la astucia y la agilidad determinan el decurso de la batalla. Los golpes pueden ser leves cual caricia del zefiro o devastadores cual tempestad marina. Las combinaciones de movimientos, saltos y acometidas son muchas y dispares, permitiendo que cada escaramuza sea distinta de la precedente, cual si cada lid fuere una melodía única en la balada del guerrero.

El honor y la gloria aguardan a aquellos que se aventuran en los torneos, donde las almas más valientes ponderan sus fuerzas con guerreros de todos los rincones del orbe. La competencia es fiera y solo los más dedicados alcanzan la cumbre de las tablas de clasificación. Mas non temáis, pues incluso el más humilde de los noveles puede hallar gozo en las lides amistosas, donde la victoria es menos cardinal que la alegría de la contienda.

Cual reino que non cesa de crecer, Brawlhalla recibe con asiduidad nuevas leyendas, arenas y modos de lidia. Este crecimiento perpetuo asegura que ningún guerrero se sienta ajeno ni desabrido.

Oh, estimado lector, si vuestro corazón anhela la emoción de la lid, os encomiendo con fervor que os adentréis en las arenas de Brawlhalla. Non importa si sois novel o veterano de mil batallas, pues este juego acoge a todos con los brazos abiertos, otorgando una experiencia digna de bardos y juglares.

Que las espadas reluzcan y los martillos retumben, pues Brawlhalla es y será un torneo perpetuo, donde la gloria non desfallece.

183699299.review:
Free to play fun fighting game with a lot of characters and different weapons combinations to choose from, each bringing their own unique twist. Every legend has a bunch of colors to select from, giving them distinct looks, on top of that, every costume they have is also affected by these colors, some are seasonal, some are related to gamepass, others are exclusives, but every single one is unique and looks fanstatic (most of the time).
Features crossovers that range from Star Wars, to Spongebob, Megaman or The Walking Dead just to name a few. It has a lot of replayability thanks to all their unique game modes, ranging from free for all, 1v1, 2v2, experimental and special modes, which are rotated each week to keep the game fresh, on top of that, it's always getting new content, keeping things even more unique.
Competitive is neat and has a lot of challenge to it past the 1300 mark! And it has support on several platforms and both keyboard, regular/ps/xbox controller, switch joycon and several other type of devices supported.

Quick Score: 8/10
